instructions: Put the dinner plate in the center of the table cloth
Put the salad plate on top of and in the center of the dinner plate
Put the folded napkin on the salad plate in the center of the salad plate
Put the wine class in the top right corner of the table cloth near the dinner plate
Put the water class slightly below and diagonal to the wine glass.
Put the salad fork to the left of the dinner plate
Put the dinner fork in between the salad fork and the dinner plate.
Put the dinner knife, with the blade facing the dinner plate, close and to the right of the plate
Put the soup spoon next to the dinner knife and in close the the wine glass
